Properties

TPChartTypeBar type

Detailed Description

Bar Chart example: http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?cht=bvs&chs=200x125&chd=t:10,50,60,80,40|50,60,100,40,20&chco=4d89f9,c6d9fd&chbh=20&chds=0,160

Property Documentation

- (int) barWidth [read, write, assign]

Width of the bars in px 0 = automatic

- (int) spaceBetweenBars [read, write, assign]

Width of the bars in pixel 0 = otomatic

- (int) spaceBetweenGroups [read, write, assign]

Space between the bars 0 = automatic

- (TPChartTypeBar) type [read, write, assign]

Type of the chart One of: TPChartTypeBarBHS, TPChartTypeBarBVS, TPChartTypeBarBHG or TPChartTypeBarBVG
